benefits.name: Ability Score Increase
effects: Increase your Strength score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

benefits.name: Heavy Weapon Mastery
effects: When you hit a creature with a weapon that has the Heavy property as part of the Attack action on your turn, you can cause the weapon to deal extra damage to the target. The extra damage equals your Proficiency Bonus.

benefits.name: Hew
effects: Immediately after you score a Critical Hit with a Melee weapon or reduce a creature to 0 Hit Points with one, you can make one attack with the same weapon as a Bonus Action.
